title: Descr of a Mexican Textile Factory 1629 Q2

content.question: The description of the labor practices in the second paragraph best supports the conclusion that

choices.label: European colonial authorities were successful in ending forced indigenous labor in the Americas
Europeans continued to rely on forced indigenous labor despite a steady increase in the use of African enslaved persons in the Americas
European missionaries were more concerned about the religious practices of indigenous peoples than about their working conditions
European merchants exploited racial tensions between various indigenous groups to increase their profits

content.answer: Europeans continued to rely on forced indigenous labor despite a steady increase in the use of African enslaved persons in the Americas
